thread.title: James Harkins
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by James Harkins

author: James Harkins
title: James Harkins
text: I paid for item 11/22/16, it is now 2/22/17 and I still have not received the part I ordered. My last email was sent almost two weeks ago and has yet to be answered. I did get one message left in my voicemail but never was able to actually speak to this person when I called back. The part was only $60, I give up!!
